job_title: Arzt/Ärztin in Göttingen, Lower Saxony
pros: Good development opportunities, friendly and helpful staff
cons: Mostly old buildings from the 1960s, makes the indoor atmosphere slightly depressing

review_title: Nice colleagues, but lousy job conditions
job_title: Wissenschaftlicher Mitarbeiter in Göttingen, Lower Saxony
pros: Usually very nice colleagues and a good work atmosphere, albeit a little hierarchical
cons: Lots of red tape. Precarious job situation, about 80% of jobs are limited-term, and management will do everything to screw you out of job security. If you want the boredom of routine scientific tasks with the job insecurities of a post-doc, this place is for you. Otherwise, run, as fast as you can. No prospects, a true career dead-end.

review_title: Very professional and friendly work environment
job_title: Postdoctoral Research Fellow in Gera
pros:
Professional
many opportunities
Varied research topics
Friendly staff
international environment
cons:
Bureaucracy
lengthy paper work
no salary hike

job_title: PhD Student in Göttingen, Lower Saxony
pros: Good income. Good investment for science.
cons: Depending the day the environment is too unfriendly and competitive.

job_title: PhD Student in Göttingen, Lower Saxony
pros: It is easy to apply there.  There are many PhD positions
cons: There are different salaries among PhD students

job_title: Researcher in Göttingen, Lower Saxony
pros: Pay is  below market average
cons: Short term contracts are not great

job_title: PhD Molecular Biology in Göttingen, Lower Saxony
pros: salary, group, facilities, environment, health
cons: everything is good, do not have anything to mention
